modName: Better Shrouded Armour Fix  - 1st Person Female
summary: Fixes first person view for Halfdead's Better Shrouded Armor
descriptionHtml: Made using Scepth's Better Shrouded Armour Quick Fix. I got annoyed that there wasnt a fix out there for female characters, so modified scepths fix to work for both males and females. All credits go to Scepth as all i did was duplicate and rename the files. Hope this helps others.  Must be used with Creasta's Female Glove Fix and obviously Halfdead's Better Shrouded Armor
author: Induril
